get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_enum_parser_bin
  TOOL_enum_parser_dependency
  tools/enum_parser/enum_parser
  enum_parser
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_enum_parser_bin
  TOOL_enum_parser_dependency
  tools/enum_parser/enum_parser
  enum_parser
)

add_library(cpp-token-lite)


target_link_libraries(cpp-token-lite PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  tools-enum_parser-enum_serialization_runtime
  library-cpp-langmask
)

target_sources(cpp-token-lite PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/token/accent.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/token/nlptypes.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/token/token_util.cpp
)



generate_enum_serilization(cpp-token-lite
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/token/nlptypes.h
  INCLUDE_HEADERS
  library/cpp/token/nlptypes.h
)

generate_enum_serilization(cpp-token-lite
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/token/formtype.h
  INCLUDE_HEADERS
  library/cpp/token/formtype.h
)
